Our school embraces students at a young age. As they graduate as young adults, they are ready to give, work and conquer lifeâs difficulties.

IPS-J is more than my school. I consider it my second home. It is my big, loving, extended family.

With education and knowledge, we are the ambassadors to the future. IPS-J is our gateway to the world.

Our school is embedded in rich traditions, preserving Emirati and Islamic heritage. We are immensely proud of generations of educated IPS-J alumni who have been proudly serving our nation.

Ø³ØªØ¨ÙÙ Ù Ø¯Ø±Ø³Ø© Ø§ÙØ§ØªØ­Ø§Ø¯ ÙÙØ¨ÙØ¹ Ø¹Ø°Ø¨ ÙÙÙÙ Ù ÙÙ ÙÙ Ø£ÙÙØ§Ù Ø§ÙÙ Ø¹Ø±ÙØ© ÙÙÙØ§ÙØ¨ Ø§ÙØ¹Ø§ÙÙ Ø¨ÙØ§Ø ÙÙØ¶Ø¹ Ø¨ØµÙ ØªÙØ§ ÙÙØ­Ù Ù ØªÙ Ø³ÙÙÙ Ø¨Ø£ØµØ§ÙØªÙØ§ ÙØ£Ø®ÙØ§ÙÙØ§Ø ÙØ­Ù Ø¹ÙØ§Ù Ø²Ø§ÙØ¯

IPS-J will always remain a fountain of knowledge, the source that keeps us connected with the world. We will leave our footprints globally, while remaining true to our heritage and values. We are Sheikh Zayed's children!

Our newly remodeled, world class pool is open now! Two swimming pools are available to cater for students from Pre-KG to Grade 12; both children's and adult pools are equipped with heater chiller, to maximize the use in all seasons, and safety appliances.

An impressive spacious air-conditioned gym with a new anchored-resilient, high-performance sports surface floor with a large seating capacity and a big stage is used as the main indoor teaching space for the Physical Education Department for the Elementary, Middle and High Schools. Kindergarten Section have their own well-padded, air-conditioned and appropriately equipped PE Hall.

The school has 2 large, well-furnished and well stocked Libraries that provide an exciting range of fiction and non-fiction books and Computers are provided in the libraries and the Resource Center for research and internet use. We have sing

le database through Follett LMS (i.e. Webpath Express) which provides access to over 102,000 websites.

Three shaded spacious multipurpose courts, for Basketball, Volleyball, Handball, and Tennis.

The school has a standard sized football field with natural grass, to provide a safe playing surface for our students. It is also used for competitions, celebrations, assemblies, performances and other large-scale events.

IPSJ emphasizes developing the scientific skills, such as observing, exploring, investigating, inferring, experimenting, and problem solving. To support this approach the school has four fully equipped, purpose-built Science Labs (including Physics/Chemistry) and a full time science technician.

There are 6 well equipped Computer Labs available for students to use all connected to the school's network running Microsoft Server 2013 and equipped with interactive Projectors and Apple TV. These excellent resources are all aimed at enhancing the quality of teaching and learning within the school. Students from Grades 4 to 12 follow the BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Policy. Teachers in all Grade levels use MacBook/iPads for teaching and learning.

These attractive shaded courtyards and green fenced areas dotted around the campus are fitted out with benches to allow students to meet with friends, snack and relax in calm surroundings.

The school playground provides a safe outdoors environment within the school that stimulates students to use their creative energy in healthy interactions with one another.

IPSJ believed that art is not only the mastery of skills and creative expression but also a form of communication and creative expression of ideas. The school has two spacious well-resourced art rooms for Middle and High School students, and one equipped art room in the Elementary Section, where students develop their art skills and techniques utilizing various mediums and learn to express themselves through this form of language.
